name: Razer Imperator Mouse 2012 Battlefield 3 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Rubberized contoured thumb grip for added control, Ergonomic right-handed design, Adjustable side buttons, Razer Synapse Onboard Memory, Up to 200 inches per second /50g acceleration, Seven independently programmable Hyperesponse buttons, On-the-Fly Sensitivity adjustment, Zero-acoustic Ultraslick mouse feet]
